snippet: Colorado State University’s Global Campus would give three credits to students who complete one of Udacity’s free “massive open online courses.”
abstract: Higher education experts have been considering whether to offer credit to students who have taken Udacity's free 'massive open online courses,' or MOOCs, and what might be done to prevent cheating; Colorado State University's Global Campus has decided to offer transfer credits for an introductory computer science class, making it the first American institution to offer credit for a Udacity MOOC.
lead_paragraph: Colorado State University’s Global Campus would give three credits to students who complete one of Udacity’s free “massive open online courses.”

headline.main: Colorado State to Offer Credits for Online Class
headline.print_headline: Colorado State to Offer Credits for Online Class
